slides.text: You will learn how to use Github - a social network for programmers. Check it out and then come back - but just take a quick look, you DON'T need to do signup yet.
For support you will be able to use WizardAmigos Gitter chat. You will create an account in the next lessons, so just a sneak peek for now.
You will play a programming game Code Combat. Don't start playing it yet, wait for the further instructions first.

First you will set up your environment (create an account and get to know some tools you will be using), then you will learn the grammar/syntax of JavaScript programming language and after that you will build your web and mobile app. Get started now! The world is yours.
